tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RiskFactors (
    factor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    factor_name VARCHAR(255),
    factor_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ClaimPatterns (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(50),
    claim_status VARCHAR(50),
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE RiskFactors (
  risk_factor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  risk_factor_name VARCHAR(255),
  risk_factor_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(255),
  trend_description TEXT,
  trend_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE ClaimPatterns (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  claim_date TIMESTAMP,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE UnderwritingStrategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
  strategy_description TEXT,
  pricing_strategy JSONB
)
